name: east
description: node.js database migration tool for mongodb, sqlite, postgres, mysql, couchbase
author: Oleg Korobenko <oleg.korobenko@gmail.com>

scripts.makeCodeCoverageDetailReport: npm run _test ./ -- --reporter dot --coverage --coverage-report html --no-browser test && echo "*** Code coverage report done, checkout ./coverage dir"
scripts.makeCodeCoverageSummaryReport: npm run _test ./ -- --reporter dot --coverage --coverage-report text-summary test | sed -re 's/(Statements|Branches|Functions|Lines)/\1 code coverage/g'
